resources.string: Here you can find all the information about covid 19

The relationship between humidity and the spread of the coronavirus is scientifically demonstrable. This means that when the humidity is up to 30%, transmitting the virus is the least successful. The virus cannot withstand this humidity. The virus is most resistant at a humidity of between 30 and 40%. This means that the spread of the chance of spreading the virus is the highest. All percentages outside these mentioned, provide a moderate circumstance for the virus, and transmission is not excluded, but also not very easy.
